name: sample_day_topk_v1
description: Fixture for testing Top-K v1 feature-based symbol selection
notes: 6 symbols with varying characteristics: HIGHUSDT (high range, high liquidity), MEDUSDT (medium range, medium liquidity), LOWUSDT (low range, very high liquidity - selected first due to liquidity), TRENDUSDT (trending - high net_return penalty), THINUSDT (thin book - gated by THIN_BOOK), WIDEUSDT (moderate spread - not gated, just not selected)
